Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by its Executive Vice-President Xing Yunming, which is participating in the celebrations of the 60th birthday of the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
